mapper.select: SELECT b.board_num ,title ,content ,bdate ,VIEWS ,board_type_num ,m.member_num ,member_nick ,find_num ,find_reward ,find_pet ,find_lost_loc ,find_lost_date FROM board b ,member m ,find f WHERE board_type_num = 11 AND b.member_num = m.member_num AND b.board_num = f.board_num and rownum <=3 ORDER BY board_num DESC

SELECT picture_fname, board_num FROM (select rownum n, picture_fname, board_num from (SELECT p.picture_fname, b.board_num FROM picture p, board b where board_type_num = 11 and b.board_num = p.board_num ORDER BY b.board_num desc, picture_file_num ))

select board_type_num, title, content, bdate, boho_find_loc, picture_file_num, picture_fname from (select * from boho bh, board b, picture p, member m where bh.board_num = b.board_num and p.board_num = b.board_num and m.member_num = b.member_num order by bdate desc) where rownum <=3
